price: Basi nafsi yake ikampelekea kumuuwa nduguye, akamuuwa na akawa miongoni mwa wenye kukhasirika.
arabic: فَطَوَّعَتۡ لَهُۥ نَفۡسُهُۥ قَتۡلَ أَخِيهِ فَقَتَلَهُۥ فَأَصۡبَحَ مِنَ ٱلۡخَٰسِرِينَ
footnotes: Basi nafsi yake ilimsahilishia kukhalifiana na maumbile, kumuuwa nduguye, akamuuwa. Kwa hivyo akawa kwa mujibu wa hukumu ya Mwenyezi Mungu miongoni mwa walio khasiri, kwa kuwa ameipoteza imani yake na amempoteza nduguye.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: faṭawwaʿat lahu nafsuhu qatla akhīhi faqatalahu fa-aṣbaḥa mina al-khāsirīna
